TI: [A comparative neurophysiological analysis of the trace processes in delayed spatial choice and in a trace conditioned reflex in rhesus macaques].
AB: The dynamics of spatial-temporal interrelationships in delayed spatial choice and in differentiation between two conditioned reflexes was studied with the aid of a distant synchronization of electrical activity of prefrontal cortex hippocampus, head of the caudate nucleus and mediodorsal nucleus of the thalamus in 6 rhesus monkeys. A comparative neurophysiological analysis revealed the elements of similarity and difference in the trace processes in both behavioral models which were correlated with the animal behaviour.
TT: Sravnitel'nyi neirofiziologicheskii analiz sledovykh protsessov pri otsrochennom prostranstvennom vybore i sledovom uslovnom reflekse u makak rezusov.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1990 Mar;76(3):295-303.
